name: A Game for Mom
description:
A game by Guilty Armadillo

In this game you play as a kid wanting to talk about video games with your mother. She however hesitates since she doesn't really like games. This developes into a talk about what she would like to see in video games. You then create different ideas for games and are rewarded with generated images of all of your ideas. There are 7776 possible creation and 3 chapters containing a continuous storyline.

We created this game in a game Jam in one week. It isn't entirely finished yet. But we will continue working on it since there are only a few things missing to complete our vision of the game.

Also this game is in german, so I don't really know why I wrote this text in engish.

Anyways, have fun playing :)
